mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_account (create_time, last_modified_time, remark, uid, password, bind_phone, bind_email) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{remark}, #{uid}, #{password}, #{bindPhone}, #{bindEmail})
